[Easy uploads for edge-delivered files]{br="«R15bttffblslfb»" brr="0.6"
style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;text-decoration:inherit;text-wrap:balance"}

[[]{br="«R1lbttffblslfb»" brr="0"
style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;text-decoration:inherit;text-wrap:balance"}]{.headline_description__62c_1}

The simplest way to store and access media files on a global network.
Perfect for unstructured data like images, videos, and audio files.

### Built for modern web frameworks {#built-for-modern-web-frameworks .gradient-text_gradientText__CcQdF .section-heading_title__UnoTh}

[[Designed for the evolution of JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks,
Vercel Blob allows developers to store and retrieve any file with an
intuitive, promise-based API.]{br="«R16bttffblslfb»" brr="0.5"
style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;text-decoration:inherit;text-wrap:balance"}]{.section-heading_subtitle__ubd6s}

::::::: {.relative .code-block_wrapper__t6FCO .code-block_hasFileName__ezlBD .storage-examples_codeBlock__zdzGJ .storage-examples_activeBlock__ag0lT geist-code-block=""}
:::::: code-block_header__t3NRd
:::: code-block_fileName__HmSv1
::: {.code-block_iconWrapper__TuHFk aria-hidden="true"}
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::

[app/profile/route.ts]{.code-block_filenameP__02nok}
::::

::: code-block_actions__yphRf
![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
:::
::::::

``` {.prism-code .language-tsx .code-block_pre___OLfy}
import { put } from '@vercel/blob'; export async function PUT(request: Request) {  const form = await request.formData();  const file = form.get('file') as File;  const blob = await put('avatars/user-42.png', file, { access: 'public' });   return Response.json(blob);}
```

### Highly available at the lowest latency {#highly-available-at-the-lowest-latency .gradient-text_gradientText__CcQdF .section-heading_title__UnoTh}

[[]{br="«R16jttffblslfb»" brr="0.5"
style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;text-decoration:inherit;text-wrap:balance"}]{.section-heading_subtitle__ubd6s}

Give your files a global home. With one URL, store and read file objects
from anywhere.
:::

::: globe_globe__ZQEHc

::: diagram-section_diagramContent__TTZoP
#### Global file storage {#global-file-storage .diagram-section_diagramTitle__qH4x4}

With Vercel Blob, upload and serve files from a global network through
unique and secure, immutable URLs.
:::

Ready for the edge
::::

[]{.diagram-section_diagramCardDescription__YlOTq}

For low-latency, high-throughput reads and writes, designed to work
natively with Vercel\'s compute products.
